description.p: The EclipseLink DBWS component enables Java developers a declarative Web Service solution for accessing relational databases. The DBWS Builder generates the necessary configuration files based on the provided database artifacts so that EclipseLink's relational and persistence services can be combined to handle the requests.

section.name: EclipseLink DBWS Overview
section.em: Brief walk through of the DBWS configuration files and usage with the DBWSBuilder utility.

section.name: Generating a Web Service for accessing a Table
section.em: Basic example illustrating how a table can easily be exposed as a web service using default CRUD operations.
